name: Sleep Walking Tractor
description:
The Sleep Walking Tractor needs to fend off waves of critters and creatures to protect the farm land from being over run and left barren. You must  use your Z blaster to put the rampaging forest animals to sleep so they can rest up and wake up relaxed and leave you and your farm alone.

Modifications from the tutorial:

  1. Menu music
  2. In game music
  3. Main Menu Screen has a cover photo
  4. 3 unique levels created
  5. 3 new enemies created with increasing numbers and health points per level
  6. New in game sound effects for enemies hit and defeat noise
  7. Final level is considered the 'Boss' level with a single large high HP enemy
  8. Player sprite is a tractor with a custom projectile with new sounds
  9. All new enemies and player have new animations as well as sounds

Created by: Kunai Kreations  & special thanks to the game idea which came from Hailey my 3yr old!
